description: Architected and led the development of a distributed data processing platform, increasing throughput by 300%.
Designed and implemented a low-latency microservices framework in Go for real-time analytics.
Mentored junior engineers and established team-wide coding standards and best practices.
Developed and maintained backend services for a large-scale e-commerce platform using Python and Django.
Built a CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins and Docker, reducing deployment times by 75%.
Contributed to the frontend development using React and TypeScript.
